---
title: "Profile Summary (MO)"
description: |
  Profile summary report generated from a single Parquet file has been created from 190 NetCDF files from the Mediterranean Sea in situ NRT observations.
output:
  distill::distill_article:
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 2
---

```{r include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
r_func_path <- "./_func"
r_funcs <- c("libraries.Rmd", "common.Rmd", "common_mo.Rmd", "summary_common.Rmd")
```

```{r, import, child=file.path(r_func_path, r_funcs)}
```

## 1. Basic Information
```{r, basic_info, results = 'asis'}
res <- knitr::knit_expand(t_s_basic_info)
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```

---

## 2. Location Filtering
```{r, location_filtering, results = 'asis'}
src <- knitr::knit_expand(t_s_location_filtering2, df=df_name)
res <- knitr::knit_child(text = src, quiet = TRUE)
cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
